headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 8 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 8 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 4 critical, 23 high, 5 medium, 7 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 24 other bases. 5 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, low cloud base and mist  — most notably around David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK). Network hotspots: Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Castellón-Costa Azahar (CDT/LECH), David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 3 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, cold‑temperature performance penalties and mist. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Castellón-Costa Azahar (CDT/LECH), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 8 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 100 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 1.5 km, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 21 others. Worst affected now: Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Castellón-Costa Azahar (CDT/LECH) — CRIT: crosswind limitation risk; strong gusts risk (drivers: crosswind limitations) | David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO) — CRIT: strong gusts risk (drivers: operational constraints) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK) — CRIT: freezing fog; visibility down to 100 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: freezing fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking) and 2 others. Changed since last run: Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Castellón-Costa Azahar (CDT/LECH), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Warsaw Radom (RDO/EPRA), Rzeszów-Jasionka (RZE/EPRZ), Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) and 2 others.
